title: Oasis Juice Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Salad bar, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, Ethiopian
description: Small juice and smoothie bar in Harlem with plenty of vegan options. As of Jan 2014 prices are $4 for 12oz, $5 for 16oz and $5.75 for 20oz. Also has coffee and tea, breakfast options, a salad bar, soups, assorted health foods (dried nuts and fruits), and Ethiopian lunch specials (the owner is from Ethiopia).
